text: The Real Housewives of Orange County star Shannon Beador ‘ s divorce from ex - husband David got nasty this week when the father - of - three demanded joint custody while accusing Shannon of “ excessive drinking ” and “ alienating him from his kids, ” according to exclusive court documents obtained by RadarOnline. com! Now, less than one week after David filed the explosive docs, Radar exclusively learned Shannon isn ’ t buying any of his “ lies ” and is ready for war!
